l10n.unableToSendRecovery: Unable to send password recovery email at the moment. Try again later.
l10n.passwordReqs:
Use at least {{minsize}} characters
Use a combination of at least {{required}} different types of characters: lowercase letters, uppercase letters, numbers, symbols, and other letters.
l10n.invalidCredentialsAttempts: Incorrect email address or password. You can reset your password by clicking the link below.
l10n.serverError: Unable to log you in at the moment. Try again later
l10n.sessionExpired: Session expired. Log in to continue
l10n.accountBlocked: Too many failed log in attempts. For your security, your account has been blocked for {{blockedMinutes}} minutes.
l10n.displayNameReqs:
Use up to {{maxsize}} characters
Don't begin or end with a space. Don't use consecutive spaces.
l10n.subscribe: Don't miss out! Get the latest rewards, promotions, and more from GeForce and NVIDIA.
l10n.agreeToTerms: I agree to the terms and conditions
l10n.displayNameDetails: Your display name will be visible to everyone

l10n.fillOutAllFields: Fill out all the required fields below
l10n.coppaText: In compliance with the US Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), we are unable to allow your registration. For additional information, please see NVIDIA’s Privacy Policy.
l10n.forgotPasswordText: Enter the email address you used to create your account, and we will send you the link to reset your password
l10n.forgotPasswordSentText:
We have sent an email to {{email}} with instructions to create a new password.

Your existing password has not been changed
l10n.scanInstructions: To get started, scan your system for installed games
l10n.loginServerError: We are unable to log you in at the moment. Try again later.

l10n.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to our Terms & Conditions

l10n.formError: An error occurred. Please check the form and try again.

l10n.clickContinueAfter: Click continue after completing the step above
l10n.notBeenVerified: The email address has not been verified yet
l10n.unableToConnect: Unable to connect to server. Try again later.

l10n.existingAccount: The email address {{email}} is associated with an existing NVIDIA account
l10n.shareDialogDescription: Allows you to easily record videos, take screenshots, play cooperatively, or broadcast while you game.
l10n.mustBeOnline: GeForce Experience needs to be online to login
l10n.applyTheBestSettings: Applies the best game settings tailored to your PC
l10n.clickContinueToInstallDriver: Click continue to install the latest Game Ready driver
l10n.enableGamestreamDescription: Stream games from your PC to NVIDIA SHIELD.
l10n.oobeWelcomeText: Your gateway to great PC gaming
l10n.gameReadyDrivers: Keep your drivers up to date
l10n.oobeShieldOverlayText: Easily pair your PC to SHIELD devices
l10n.oobeGiftsOverlayText: Get access to free prizes and great giveaways
l10n.oobeScanText: GeForce Experience analyses your specific CPU, GPU, and display monitor and applies customised game settings for the best experience.
l10n.oobeShareText: GeForce Experience offers ShadowPlay in the new Share Overlay
l10n.oobeShareHotkeyInfo: Press {{assignedKey}} to share your gameplay and access settings.
l10n.oobeStreamText: GeForce Experience uses NVIDIA GameStream™ technology to bring high-fidelity, low-latency PC gaming to NVIDIA® SHIELD™ devices.
l10n.oobeStreamText1: Enjoy the convenience of playing PC games on your TV or tablet.
l10n.playOnShield: Stream your games to NVIDIA SHIELD
